lead_paragraph: JONES--Ira Snow. The Department of Ophthalmology at Columbia University Medical Center mourns the passing of Ira Snow Jones, M.D. who was associated with the institution for over 50 years. After receiving his medical degree from its College of Physicians and Surgeons, he completed his residency at the Harkness Eye Institute here and then joined the faculty. He became a world-renowned expert in orbital tumors during his tenure as Professor of Ophthalmology. We extend our condolences to his wife, Vasso, his children, and extended family. George Cioffi, M.D., Chairman; Stanley Chang, M.D., Chairman Emeritus Dept. of Ophthalmology, Columbia University Medical Center 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JONES, IRA SNOW
